code: library(endeavr) mvnpdf(X = matrix(rep(1,6), 2, 3),                   mean = c(1,2,3),                   varcovM = diag(2),                   Log = TRUE) #> $`Input matrix` #>      [,1] [,2] [,3] #> [1,]    1    1    1 #> [2,]    1    1    1 #>  #> $`MVN density` #> [1] -1.837877 -2.837877 -5.837877 #>  #> attr(,"class") #> [1] "mvnpdf"
